description: This file declares functions related to subscribing and unsubscribing to interval-based message bus topics in the CCSP (Cisco Common Software Platform) library, specifically utilizing RBUS. It defines function prototypes for registration of interval subscriptions and unsubscriptions, and includes necessary headers and type definitions.

methods.name: Ccsp_RbusInterval_Subscribe
methods.description: Function to subscribe to an interval-based message bus notification for a specified parameter with a given interval and duration.

methods.name: Ccsp_RbusInterval_Unsubscribe
methods.description: Function to unsubscribe from a previously subscribed interval message bus notification.
